function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of ehealth wearables for COVID-19 data interpretation and monitoring.","Impact":"Inadequate data interpretation models and inaccuracies in monitoring can lead to misdiagnosis and incorrect treatment of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Validation of data interpretation models, regular calibration of wearables, and cross-verification with traditional medical diagnostics.","Technologies":"Machine learning (ML), deep learning (DL), cloud/edge/fog computing for data storage and processing.","People":"Patients using wearables, healthcare professionals relying on wearable data.","Owner":"Researchers, healthcare providers, technology developers."},{"Description":"Utilization of wearable devices in the healthcare system.","Impact":"Social, technical, and political challenges such as data privacy, security, and regulatory compliance may arise.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust data privacy protocols, secure data transmission, and adherence to healthcare regulations.","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure communication protocols, compliance management tools.","People":"Patients using wearables, healthcare professionals, policy makers.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, policy makers, technology developers."}]}
